New Records: Scotland set England a 109-run DLS target due to rain interruption
Key Match Events: The match was abandoned due to rain after 10 overs of play; England couldn't take a single wicket
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland won the toss and elected to bat; England's captain Jos Buttler mentioned hopes for a dry day for their next game
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland's captain Richie Berrington expressed frustration over the rain and mentioned the potential of the pitch; England's captain Jos Buttler talked about the tough call to play Archer and Wood
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-affected, leading to no completed innings for either team; Scotland's openers shared a 90-run partnership
